text: Burwell Otis Jones (March 23, 1933 - February 6, 2021) was an American competition swimmer. He was born in Detroit, Michigan. He was a Pan American Games champion in 1951. Jones was born in Detroit, Michigan. Jones competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics. Jones died on February 6, 2021 at the age of 87.Burwell O. title: Burwell Jones
